hero.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
hero.subtitle: A showcase of my work, skills, and interests.

about.title: About Me
about.text: Experienced Embedded Systems Software Programmer and AUTOSAR Engineer with a background at Robert Bosch. Skilled in Classic AUTOSAR, Functional testing and feature integration for OEMs like BMW and JLR. Currently pursuing a Master’s in Automotive Software Engineering at TU Chemnitz, with a thesis on AI-Based Source Code Generation from Requirements. Proficient in Python, Pandas, Tensor flow and C++. Passionate about sustainable tech—developed a solar-wind hybrid electric vehicle prototype. Fluent in English, with intermediate German proficiency and a strong drive to innovate for a better tomorrow.
